runs.notes: Rest Day. Focus on hydration, nutrition, and sleep. Optional light mobility work or gentle yoga (15-20 mins).

Easy Run 10km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Keep this truly easy to prepare for Thursday's long run. Focus on relaxed form. Warm-up: 5 min easy walk, followed by dynamic stretches. Cool-down: 5 min very easy jog, followed by light stretches.
Easy Run 8km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Relaxed effort to prepare for tomorrow's long run. Warm-up/cool-down: Keep minimal (5 min each) to preserve energy.

Long Run 24km at 6:15-6:45/km pace. Even effort throughout. Take water every 20-30 mins, energy gels at 8km and 16km. Focus on steady endurance rather than speed. Warm-up: 5-10 min easy jogging + dynamic stretches. Cool-down: 5-10 min very easy walking + light stretching.
Rest Day. Focus on recovery from yesterday's long run. Optional light stretching, foam rolling, or gentle yoga (15-20 mins).

Quality Session: Total 10km as follows: 2km warm-up, 6 x 800m at threshold pace (5:45-6:00/km) with 400m recovery jogs, 2km cool-down. Focus on controlled effort rather than specific pace. Warm-up: 10 min progressive jog + dynamic drills. Cool-down: 10 min easy jog + stretching.

Hilly Medium-Long Run 14km at 6:30-6:45/km on flats, effort-based on hills. Focus on strong uphill form and controlled downhill running. Warm-up: 5 min easy jogging + hip mobility exercises. Cool-down: 5 min easy jog + stretching.
